LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="8c8bb408ee8f4efaa95e499b60f18cee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It would be remiss of me not to
acknowledge or even...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]thank you for
saving my life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c8bb408ee8f4efaa95e499b60f18cee" Scale="1"/]That said,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I came here as an actor and a
master of my craft with the express
purpose[etc:Wait frame="8"/] TO get shipwrecked.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c8bb408ee8f4efaa95e499b60f18cee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm preparing for a role,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you see.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But I'm
sure this experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] being saved,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can
be put to good use as well.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="cc4999d57482433c8f02e58d306c9d86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you must know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I will be embodying the
lead role in a series where my character is
shipwrecked on an unknown planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc4999d57482433c8f02e58d306c9d86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I always prepare for roles through real-life
experiences.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though finding an unexplored
planet was a challenge.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I nearly gave up...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc4999d57482433c8f02e58d306c9d86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]But then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] out of nowhere, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I heard about
this uncharted planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I couldn't let
the opportunity slip through my fingers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc4999d57482433c8f02e58d306c9d86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]So as you can see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] being shipwrecked was
my true intention.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc4999d57482433c8f02e58d306c9d86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But my plans were cut short when my
suit's forced-sleep mode kicked in.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="0dbb84818cdd40fdbd53ba9ca1e77747" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've embodied a myriad of characters,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and I prepared for each one with gripping
firsthand experiences![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0dbb84818cdd40fdbd53ba9ca1e77747" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I've been a cheerful yet sprightly plumber,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
an adventurer who can ingest anything,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and even a hero with a traumatic past.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="e9fc418182dd48a1ae2e8049415659a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s experiences are certainly
leading-role material.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm terribly
jealous I couldn't go through them myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9fc418182dd48a1ae2e8049415659a9" Scale="1"/]It would be nearly impossible to recreate
such circumstances,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I'll just ask if I can
interview him for a character study.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="752baaad95894858843af9f30d207e7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The work of the Rescue Corps is truly
impressiveâ€”nay...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]astounding![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd love to
hear all about it sometime.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] For research.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="752baaad95894858843af9f30d207e7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there'd be something in it for
you as well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="752baaad95894858843af9f30d207e7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You don't have a copy of my autograph
yet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do you?
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="ac4a890517e84495a277e11c93633a2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My younger brother, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], came here
as well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sure his journey was meant
to inspire his next great venture.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ac4a890517e84495a277e11c93633a2e" Scale="1"/]It was he who took over our fussy father's
business so I could pursue my dreams.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm
quite proud of him.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's so very...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]reliable.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="566931a770c44dd989ad266ceb1cee3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I know twins are famous for mischief,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] but
I'm very sorry for all the inconvenience my
brother and I have caused.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="566931a770c44dd989ad266ceb1cee3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I'd like to offer you more than my most
sincere apology...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="566931a770c44dd989ad266ceb1cee3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Would you also like a copy of my
autograph?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's the least I can do.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="15bc0f7073f04ae9b6ad22cb7b743b50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm famous for my role in Carrot Planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15bc0f7073f04ae9b6ad22cb7b743b50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]My character crashes on an unknown
planet, and his life support is running out.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15bc0f7073f04ae9b6ad22cb7b743b50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So he forges a cooperative relationship
with these strange little creatures he
meets while there.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15bc0f7073f04ae9b6ad22cb7b743b50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]He fights for survival against many a
formidable creature but ultimately
makes his escape.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="10a8340189384151945424af02bca678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]I'm grateful to say that Carrot Planet 2
was also well received by the critics.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="10a8340189384151945424af02bca678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]My character makes it home but learns
the company he works for is now buried
in debt![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="10a8340189384151945424af02bca678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]He returns to the planet with his unreliable
partner to collect enough treasure to
repay the debt.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="10a8340189384151945424af02bca678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It's more of a buddy comedy slash
treasure-hunting adventure film.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="392a6ee261df4c819e6edb12d1e2f1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I wasn't the lead in Carrot Planet 3,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] per
se,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but my character was really the heart
of the film.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="392a6ee261df4c819e6edb12d1e2f1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]He returns to the planet to hunt for
treasure to repay yet another debt...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="392a6ee261df4c819e6edb12d1e2f1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Only to be taken captive by a mysterious
creature that appears out of nowhere![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="392a6ee261df4c819e6edb12d1e2f1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]My role was still pivotal,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you see?
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="8399dbf569084b95a071770e3c4cfb6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The story sounds familiar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] does it?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Well, of course it does![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm delighted to
report that the films were universal hits![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8399dbf569084b95a071770e3c4cfb6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I'm sure you've seen them as well.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And for
that I thank you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8399dbf569084b95a071770e3c4cfb6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Would you be interested in receiving a
copy of my autograph?
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="d5c1e46ac9834266b021c86467154d93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Come to think of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've never taken the
part of a dog before.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd very much like to
use you as a reference.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="677d56eacbd0429597bd2dfb9f1440e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Watching you work brings to mind many
memories of my family's dogs...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I miss
them dearly.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="677d56eacbd0429597bd2dfb9f1440e1" Scale="1"/]When we were younger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and
I would often take them on walks.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Twelve dogs each.
LF018.LF018_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf19"/][UE:Meta key="1a27164d43c34dbfaf22b2486317d77e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I can't believe there's someone who looks
more like me than my brother, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ever
considered a career as a stunt double?
